OpenMS

OpenMS is an cross-platform open-source software C++ library for LC/MS data management and analyses (Doc). It comes with ready-to-use tools for

  • proteomics and metabolomics data analysis (TOPPTools) and
  • 2D and 3D visualization(TOPPView).

ProteoWizard

ProteoWizard Library and Tools are a set of modular and extensible open-source, cross-platform tools and software libraries that facilitate proteomics data analysis.

  • msconvert is a command line tool for converting between various file formats.

R

  • Bioconductor is a collection of R packages for bioinformatics
  • XCMSis a Bioconductor-based package for LC-MS, tandem MS/MS data analysis
